TI: [Relation between epiphyseal-limbic-hypothalamic interrelations and regulation of gonadotropin secretion and lactation].
AB: Functional activity of hypothalamic structures was studied in endocrinological and electrophysiological experiments as well as in vitro studies. Functional changes of limbic-hypothalamic relations and control mechanisms of gonadotropin secretion under the effect of pineal polypeptides and in relation to lactation, were analysed.
TT: Epifizarno-limbiko-gipotalamicheskie vzaimootnosheniia v sviazi s reguliatsiei sekretsii gonadotropinov i laktatsiei.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1986 Jun;72(6):830-8.
